content.title: STK Modul is a reinforced concrete products factory that produces building composite materials of various types, series and sizes. They are produced both according to their own specifications and according to customer drawings.

content: The site acts primarily as a tool for searching for reinforced concrete products in an extensive catalog and ordering them. And yet, the task was not only to make a convenient and affordable catalog, but also to talk about a company that is an excellent professional in its field.

The main focus of the design was atmospheric muffled background and a red line, the color of which came from the company logo. The line draws attention to headings and leads, separating them from the rest of the page. As befits the red line, it passes through the entire site, uniting all the pages.
To improve usability, texts and animations were used as the main navigation tool. There is practically no classic look of buttons or links in the design — all this is replaced by microanimations.
An extensive catalog hierarchy is presented in the form of a convenient table. It is not at all difficult to find an interesting product.

Product map type is a link to the drawing tables by type and content, so that everyone who works with architectural drawings every day sees something familiar and can easily navigate various products, and also easily order them according to the necessary parameters.

Throughout the site, we have added switching color schemes from dark to light. This decision was dictated by practical considerations — the choice of a more comfortable mode for studying the technical characteristics of the product.
